full_prompt:

They are standing with confident postures, some holding tablets or pointers.

- professional with clean lines and modern furniture professional studio
- Two large sophisticated touch-enabled smart screens on left and right walls

- Right screen: displaying multilingual content in Italian, Hindi, Thai
